subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dany Heatley set up Daniel Alfredsson’s goal, then scored unassisted, leading the Ottawa Senators to a victory against the Devils for a 3-1 edge in their playoff series.
snippet: Dany Heatley set up Daniel Alfredsson’s goal, then scored unassisted, leading the Ottawa Senators to a victory against the Devils for a 3-1 edge in their playoff series.
